name: lttri5d
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cxr))
-| wi(w0, wne(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wn(wbr(c1, clt, c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cxr))
-| wi(w0, wne(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wn(wbr(c1, clt, c0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cxr))
-| wi(w0, wne(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wn(wbr(c1, clt, c0)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c1, cxr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c1))
-| wi(w0, wne(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wn(wbr(c1, clt, c0)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))

comment: Not equal and not larger implies smaller. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
